User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user profile for the portfolio website.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

message.description: The message the user sent from the contact form.

submissionDate.description: The date and time the contact form was submitted.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

definition.description: Stores user data. The userId is obtained from request.auth.uid. All access is based on user ID, ensuring authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, derived from request.auth.uid.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to store user contact form submissions and user profiles. A path-based ownership model is used under the `/users/{userId}` collection. This ensures proper ownership and authorization independence, as access control is based on the user's unique ID. All write operations require authentication, and listing user data is restricted to enhance security.
